title: Building with Movemate Framework
description: Explore Movemate, a comprehensive development framework for building applications on Aptos with the Move language, offering tools, libraries, and abstractions to simplify smart contract development and testing.

tasks.title: Prepare Development Environment
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Movemate

tasks.title: Movemate Basics
tasks.question: What is Movemate?
options: A development framework for building applications on Aptos
tasks.correctAnswer: A development framework for building applications on Aptos

tasks.title: Movemate Components
tasks.description: Learn about the main components of Movemate
tasks.question: Which components might be included in the Movemate framework?
options: Libraries, smart contract templates, testing tools, and deployment utilities
tasks.correctAnswer: Libraries, smart contract templates, testing tools, and deployment utilities

tasks.title: Move Language
tasks.question: What is Move in the context of Aptos development?
options: A Rust-based programming language designed for safe resource management in smart contracts
tasks.correctAnswer: A Rust-based programming language designed for safe resource management in smart contracts

tasks.title: Movemate Libraries
tasks.description: Learn about pre-built libraries in Movemate
tasks.question: What types of pre-built libraries might Movemate provide?
options: Common DeFi primitives, tokenization standards, and security utilities
tasks.correctAnswer: Common DeFi primitives, tokenization standards, and security utilities

tasks.title: Testing in Movemate
tasks.question: How does Movemate help with testing Move contracts?
options: Through unit testing frameworks, mocks, and test environments
tasks.correctAnswer: Through unit testing frameworks, mocks, and test environments

tasks.title: Resource Management
tasks.question: How does Move's resource model work in Movemate?
options: Resources can be freely copied and deleted
Resources are static and cannot be changed
Resources are linear types that can only be moved between storage locations, not copied or implicitly destroyed
Resources are automatically managed and require no explicit handling
tasks.correctAnswer: Resources are linear types that can only be moved between storage locations, not copied or implicitly destroyed

tasks.title: Deployment Tools
tasks.question: What deployment features might Movemate offer?
options: Automated deployment scripts for different Aptos environments (testnet, mainnet)
Deployment is not covered by Movemate
tasks.correctAnswer: Automated deployment scripts for different Aptos environments (testnet, mainnet)

tasks.title: Smart Contract Templates
tasks.question: What types of smart contract templates might Movemate provide?
options: Various templates including tokens, marketplaces, governance, and lending protocols
tasks.correctAnswer: Various templates including tokens, marketplaces, governance, and lending protocols

tasks.title: Security Features
tasks.question: How might Movemate help improve contract security?
options: Through code analysis tools, security patterns, and formal verification helpers
Only by hiding the code from users
tasks.correctAnswer: Through code analysis tools, security patterns, and formal verification helpers
